member.name: T:ActiproSoftware.Products.Text.Addons.Antlr.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:ActiproSoftware.Products.Text.Addons.Antlr.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:ActiproSoftware.Products.Text.Addons.Antlr.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:ActiproSoftware.Products.Text.Addons.Antlr.Resources.ExInvalidCoreLexerConstructor
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The Type '{0}' specified for the core ANTLR lexer must have a constructor that takes a single Antlr.Runtime.ICharStream parameter..

member.name: P:ActiproSoftware.Products.Text.Addons.Antlr.Resources.ExInvalidCoreLexerType
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The Type '{0}' specified for the core ANTLR lexer must inherit Antlr.Runtime.Lexer..

member.name: P:ActiproSoftware.Products.Text.Addons.Antlr.Resources.ExInvalidCoreParserConstructor
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The Type '{0}' specified for the core ANTLR parser must have a constructor that takes a single Antlr.Runtime.ITokenStream parameter..

member.name: P:ActiproSoftware.Products.Text.Addons.Antlr.Resources.ExInvalidCoreParserMethodName
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The Type '{0}' specified for the core ANTLR parser does not have a public method '{1}' defined..

member.name: P:ActiproSoftware.Products.Text.Addons.Antlr.Resources.ExInvalidCoreParserType
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The Type '{0}' specified for the core ANTLR parser must inherit Antlr.Runtime.Parser..

member.name: T:ActiproSoftware.Products.Text.Addons.Antlr.SR
member.summary: Provides access to the string resources of this assembly, also allowing for their customization.
member.remarks:
Call the method to return a resolved resource string. If a custom string has been set for a specified string resource name, it will be returned. Otherwise, the default string resource value is returned.
If any of the resource strings are customized via a call to , it is best to do so before any other classes in this assembly are referenced, such as in the application startup.

member.name: M:ActiproSoftware.Products.Text.Addons.Antlr.SR.ClearCustomStrings
member.summary: Removes all custom strings.

member.name: M:ActiproSoftware.Products.Text.Addons.Antlr.SR.ContainsCustomString(System.String)
member.summary: Returns whether a custom string is defined for the specified string resource.
member.param: The name of the resource for which to search.
member.returns: true if a custom string is defined for the specified string resource; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:ActiproSoftware.Products.Text.Addons.Antlr.SR.GetCustomString(System.String)
member.summary: Returns custom string that is stored for the specified string resource, if any.
member.param: The name of the resource to get.
member.returns: The custom string that is stored for the specified string resource, if any.

member.name: M:ActiproSoftware.Products.Text.Addons.Antlr.SR.GetString(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the resolved value of the specified string resource.
member.param: The name of the resource to get.
member.returns: The value of the resource localized for the caller's current culture settings. If a best match is not possible, is returned.

member.name: M:ActiproSoftware.Products.Text.Addons.Antlr.SR.GetString(ActiproSoftware.Products.Text.Addons.Antlr.SRName)
member.summary: Returns the resolved value of the specified string resource.
member.param: The name of the resource to get.
member.returns: The value of the resource localized for the caller's current culture settings. If a best match is not possible, is returned.

member.name: M:ActiproSoftware.Products.Text.Addons.Antlr.SR.GetString(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Returns the resolved value of the specified string resource, by calling String.Format using supplied arguments.
member.param: The name of the resource to get.
The arguments to pass to String.Format.
member.returns: The value of the resource localized for the caller's current culture settings. If a best match is not possible, is returned.

member.name: M:ActiproSoftware.Products.Text.Addons.Antlr.SR.GetString(ActiproSoftware.Products.Text.Addons.Antlr.SRName,System.Object[])
member.summary: Returns the resolved value of the specified string resource, by calling String.Format using supplied arguments.
member.param: The name of the resource to get.
The arguments to pass to String.Format.
member.returns: The value of the resource localized for the caller's current culture settings. If a best match is not possible, is returned.

member.name: M:ActiproSoftware.Products.Text.Addons.Antlr.SR.RemoveCustomString(System.String)
member.summary: Removes any custom string that is defined for the specified string resource.
member.param: The name of the resource to remove.

member.name: M:ActiproSoftware.Products.Text.Addons.Antlr.SR.SetCustomString(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sets a custom string value for the specified string resource.
member.param: The name of the resource to set.
The value of the resource to set.

member.name: T:ActiproSoftware.Text.Parsing.Implementation.AntlrParser
member.summary: Represents an (syntax/semantic analyzer) implementation that can be used to call an ANTLR parser.

member.name: M:ActiproSoftware.Text.Parsing.Implementation.AntlrParser.Parse(ActiproSoftware.Text.Parsing.IParseRequest)
member.summary: Performs a parsing operation using the parameters specified in the supplied and returns the resulting parse data.
member.param: The that contains data about the requested parsing operation.
member.returns: An that is the result of the parsing operation.
member.remarks: A typically calls this method when a queued parse request is ready to be processed.

member.name: M:ActiproSoftware.Text.Parsing.Implementation.AntlrParser.#ctor(System.String,System.Type,System.Type,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the AntlrParser class.
member.param: A string that identifies the parser.
The of core ANTLR lexer that should be used. This is the lexer generated by ANTLR.
The of core ANTLR parser that should be used. This is the parser generated by ANTLR.
The default parser method to call. This is the same as the name of the root rule in your ANTLR grammar.
